usage.cn: 生活中最大的幸福，是坚信有人爱着我们。
usage.eng: The supreme happiness of life is the conviction that we are loved.

usage.cn: 守职而不废 处义而不回。
usage.eng: I will not waver and carry out my duties,and will remain true to my conviction.

usage.cn: 苟利国家生死以，岂因祸福避趋之。
usage.eng: In line with the conviction that I will do whatever it takes to serve my country even at the cost of my own life,regardless of fortune or misfortune to myself.
